scenario.name: Basic 3pcc extended scenario
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:+17242455555@192.168.55.62:5070 SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] 192.168.55.62:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:+17661112233@192.168.55.62:[local_port];transport=[transport]>;tag=PersistentFromTagForTestingOnly123 To: <sip:+17242455555@192.168.55.62:5070> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 INVITE Contact: <sip:+17661112233@192.168.55.62:[local_port];transport=[transport]> Max-Forwards: 70 Allow: INVITE,ACK,CANCEL,BYE,REGISTER,REFER,INFO,SUBSCRIBE,NOTIFY,PRACK,UPDATE,OPTIONS Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=Sonus_UAC 265 9626 IN IP[local_ip_type] 192.168.55.62 s=SIP Media Capabilities c=IN IP[media_ip_type] 192.168.55.62 t=0 0 m=audio 10000 RTP/AVP 8 18 0 101 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000 a=rtpmap:18 G729/8000 a=fmtp:18 annexb=no a=rtpmap:0 PCMA/8000 a=rtpmap:101 telephone-event/8000 a=fmtp:101 0-15 a=sendrecv a=rtcp:52370 IN IP4 10.0.2.15 a=maxptime:60

ACK sip:+17242455555@192.168.55.62:5070 SIP/2.0 [routes] Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] 192.168.55.62:[local_port];branch=[$3] [last_From:] [last_To:] [last_Call-ID:] CSeq: 1 ACK Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0

INVITE sip:+17242455555@192.168.55.62:5070 SIP/2.0 [routes] Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] 192.168.55.62:[local_port];branch=[branch] [last_From:] [last_To:] [last_Call-ID:] CSeq: 2 INVITE Contact: <sip:+17661112233@192.168.55.62:[local_port];transport=[transport]> Max-Forwards: 70 Allow: INVITE,ACK,CANCEL,BYE,REGISTER,REFER,INFO,SUBSCRIBE,NOTIFY,PRACK,UPDATE,OPTIONS Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=1st_reInvite!!! 265 9627 IN IP[local_ip_type] 192.168.55.62 s=SIP 1st reInvite!!! c=IN IP[media_ip_type] 192.168.55.62 t=0 0 m=audio 10002 RTP/AVP 8 18 0 101 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000 a=rtpmap:18 G729/8000 a=fmtp:18 annexb=no a=rtpmap:0 PCMA/8000 a=rtpmap:101 telephone-event/8000 a=fmtp:101 0-15 a=sendrecv a=rtcp:56420 IN IP4 10.0.2.100 a=maxptime:60
scenario.sendCmd: From: m <!-- this mandatory header for 3PCC Extended! From documentation: Note that the message must contain a "From" field, filled with the name of the sender. --> [last_message]
